name: Our Dreams Are Dead
description:
Made during the NHSGA 2022 at CMU's Pre-College Programs, Our Dreams are Dead is a take on wave-based horror. In this game, the world is an elevator. Complete the puzzles and stun the evil robots to progress through each floor of the mysterious building.

Credits: Colin Kendall--Producer & Sound Designer, Josh Lukin--Programmer, Ryder Schmelzle--Programmer, Adithya Somashekhar--Artist, Alex Chow--Artist
